trans-unit.source: When Aswan Jaguar comes into play, choose a random creature type from those in target opponent's deck. {G}{G}, {T}: Bury target creature of the chosen type.

trans-unit.resname: PAST·2 | Call from the Grave | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Put a random creature from a random graveyard into play under your control. Call from the Grave deals to you an amount of damage equal to that creature's casting cost.

trans-unit.source: {2}, {T}, Pay {R} for each target: Tap any number of random target creatures. Goblins tapped in this way do not untap during their controllers' next untap phases.

trans-unit.resname: PAST·5 | Necropolis of Azar | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Whenever a non-black creature is put into any graveyard from play, put a husk counter on Necropolis of Azar. {5}, Remove a husk counter from Necropolis of Azar: Put a Spawn of Azar token into play. Treat this token as a black creature with a random power and toughness, each no less than 1 and no greater than 3, that has swampwalk.

trans-unit.source: Randomly distribute X -0/-1 counters among a random number of random target creatures.

trans-unit.source: During each player's upkeep, that player exchanges control of random target artifact, creature or land he or she controls, for control of random target permanent of the same type that a random opponent controls.

trans-unit.source: Flying During your upkeep, Prismatic Dragon becomes a random color permanently. {2}: Prismatic Dragon becomes a random color permanently.

trans-unit.source: When Rainbow Knights comes into play, it gains protection from a random color permanently. {1}: First strike until end of turn. {W}{W}: +0/+0, +1/+0 or +2/+0 until end of turn chosen at random.

trans-unit.source: {3}, {T}: Choose a random summon card from all players' decks. For each player, flip a coin. If the flip ends up heads, put a token creature into play and treat it as though an exact copy of the chosen summon card were just played.

trans-unit.source: When Gem Bazaar comes into play, choose a random color. {T}: Add to your mana pool one mana of the color last chosen. Then choose a random color.
